com.pkrete.xrd4j.rest.converter

Class XMLToJSONConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pkrete.xrd4j.rest.converter.XMLToJSONConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Converter

    public class XMLToJSONConverter
extends Object
implements Converter
    This class converts XML strings to JSON strings. If XML element names start with '__at__' string, it's converted to '@' character that's used in JSON-LD as the first character in keys.
    Author:
    Petteri Kivimäki, Markus Törnqvist
